title: Reflection Word of God
verses: 2 Timothy 3:16–17 (WEB) — “Every Scripture is God-breathed and profitable for teaching, for reproof, for correction, and for instruction in righteousness.”
Psalm 119:105 (WEB) — “Your word is a lamp to my feet, and a light for my path.”
Joshua 1:8 (WEB) — “This book of the law shall not depart from your mouth… meditate on it day and night… then you shall have good success.”
James 1:22 (WEB) — “Be doers of the word, and not only hearers, deluding your own selves.”
body: God’s Word forms us as we read it, ponder it, and obey it. Start small but steady: read a short passage, note one truth about God, one promise to trust, and one step to practice. Over time Scripture renews your mind and redirects your life.
prayer: Spirit of truth, open the Scriptures to me. Let Your Word take root, renew my mind, and bear fruit in obedient love. Amen.
